A4.text: Costa Rica's official and predominant language is Spanish.

A5.text: the Quakers community, who settled in Monteverde in the early 1950s, speaks an older dialect of English, using thou instead of you.

A6.text: Spanish is the official language—either de facto or de jure—of ... Costa Rica
